Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: addDays(_:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Adds a certain number of days to this date

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: addMinutes(_:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Adds a certain number of minutes to this date

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: addHours(_:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Adds a certain number of hours to this date

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: isSameDay(_:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Is this day the same day as the other date? Ignoreing time

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: subtractDate(_:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Subtract two dates and return them as a tuple.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Extract out the m/d/y/h/m/s parts of a date into a Tuple

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: toMonthDayYear()
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Extract out the m/d/y parts of a date into a Tuple

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: toJullianDayNumber()
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Converts this date to the Jullian Day

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: fromMonth(_:day:year:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Creates a date from the provided date components

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: isBetween(_:and:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Is this date between startDate and endDate

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: numberOfMinutesBetween(_:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: How many minutes have passed between this date and otherDate

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: numberOfMinutesBetweenNow()
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: How many minutes have passed between this date and the current date

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: toZuluFormattedString()
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Convert this date to a string formatted as zulu date

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: lastHourOfDay
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: The last hour, minute, second of this day
